title: Salt Shaker Deli
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small place with a nice atmosphere. The menu includes a few vegan suitable items like a Thai noodle salad (ask for extra dressing), a hippie sandwich, and a vegan pizza (doesn't have cheese). The vegetarian chili comes with sour cream and cheddar garnish that you could request to omit.
